copyFile2Directory

public static void copyFile2Directory(java.io.File srcFile,
                                      java.io.File dir,
                                      java.lang.String destFileName,
                                      FileTransformer ft)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      FileTransformException
Transform and copy the file to the specific directory.

Parameters:
file - file to copy
dir - directory
destFileName - end file name. If it is null, it uses the original name.
ft - transformation. If it is null, there is no transformation.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file doesn't exist
FileTransformException - error transforming the file
java.io.IOException

copyFile2Directory

public static void copyFile2Directory(java.io.File srcFile,
                                      java.io.File dir,
                                      FTName[] ftNames)
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      FileTransformException
Transform and copy the file to the specific directory making several transformations..

Parameters:
file - file to copy
dir - directory
destFileName - list of ended file names.
ft - transformations. If it is null, there is no transformation.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - when the file doesn't exist
FileTransformException - error transforming the file
java.io.IOException
